db:abstract.db:para: Disables the test case directory definitions for the Qt Test targets.

db:article.db:para: This variable was introduced in Qt 6.9.

db:note.db:para: This variable is in technology preview and may change in future releases.

db:article.db:para: Disables the test case directory definitions for the Qt Test targets.
Controls the default value of the QT_SKIP_DEFAULT_TESTCASE_DIRS target property.
db:article.db:programlisting: set(QT_SKIP_DEFAULT_TESTCASE_DIRS TRUE) ... qt_add_executable(mytest1 main1.cpp) target_link_libraries(mytest1 PRIVATE Qt6::Test) ... qt_add_executable(mytest2 main2.cpp) target_link_libraries(mytest2 PRIVATE Qt6::Test)
db:article.db:para: The QT_TESTCASE_SOURCEDIR and QT_TESTCASE_BUILDDIR macros will remain undefined when compiling mytest1 and mytest2.
